short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash Kuromi’s mischievous side with the Devil Kuromi Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This playful yet edgy design showcases Kuromi with her devilish charm, perfect for fans who love her cheeky attitude. Enjoy seamless browsing with favorite site shortcuts, custom links, and an integrated calendar and clock. Effortlessly search the web with your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Kuromi’s devilish design adds a bold touch to your new tab.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access your go-to websites with ease.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your browsing with custom links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with the integrated clock and calendar.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Quickly search the web with your preferred engine.
Discover more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily via the provided links.
